column3: Traffic;Siem Reap:------ A boy on the way home from school on his bicycle was hit by a Highlander car
column4: causing his death at around 11:25 pm on November 6
column5: 2019. The incident occurred in Krous Village
column9: was a student of Hun Sen Krom Primary and Secondary School. ------The source said that the boy was seen leaving the school to return home
column10: but the cause of  the accident is not yet known. Shortly after
column11: the victim’s mother arrived at the scene. ------KBN
